titleInfo.title: 12th and Final Benefit for Room in the Inn

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and silver on white) announcing the 12th and final benefit for Room in the Inn Blue Christmas featuring Dave Pomeroy, Johnny Neel, and the Xmas Enjoyers at 12th and Porter on December 16. Poster features woodcuts of stars and Christmas trees.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
